content.prompt: Which of the following public policies is best supported by the core value of free enterprise?

choices.label: The government subsidizing the cost of milk
Congress passing legislation bailing out the automobile industry
Taxpayers funding a national high-speed railway service
After a review, the Federal Trade Commission approving a corporate merger of cable providers

topic.text: 4.1: American Attitudes About Government and Politics

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
